title: Message to Justice Oliver Wendell Holmes On His 90th Birthday.
text:
My dear Mr. Justice:

I most cordially congratulate you upon your ninetieth birthday anniversary, but yet more do I congratulate our country upon the continuance of your splendid services, and hope that you may long live in health and strength to carry them forward. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Hon. Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1720 Eye Street, N.W., Washington, D.C.]
